testcase.system-out: Given User launch application in chrome browser.............................passed When user enters credentials and click on login button......................passed Then Click on EDGE Device module from side menu bar.........................passed And scroll horizontal to see status column..................................passed Then Click on EDGE Group ID search icon i.e. three dots & enter Valid inputs into search text field.passed Then After landing on EDGE Device List please scroll horizontal and Click on Edit icon button.passed Then update Edge Name, location, Description , Assigned To from Identity section.passed Then scroll down............................................................passed Then update the value of Serial Number, OnboardingKey, ImageVersion from the Registration accordion.passed Then update the value of Server Port from the deployment....................passed Then select the value for App Group from the deployment.....................passed Then Click on Save button to update edge....................................passed
